title: GotoVillon
body:
Press put concoction on statue button

  "Merci stranger"

"Oh non! La police is there!"

Villon runs away

[[Oh no! He stole my wallet-I'll tackle him!|Stolenwallet]] [[He stole my wallet!- "Hey wait up!"|Waitup]]

title: Stolenwallet
body:
Tackle Villon

"You don't have to be violent mon ami.

You looked very heavy and I just wanted to relieve you of the weight"


Villon gives back the wallet and runs away again.

look down and see a page of sheet music on the ground. It must have fallen when you tackled him.

Pick up paper button

Oracle: Look at the back of the paper, it is addressed to the Carilloner

<<if visited("Villon") is true>> [[ Go to the Carilloner|GotoCarilloner]] 


Villon's character sheet appears 

Route to next location appears

title: Waitup
body:
Villon stops for a second and turns around.
 

 [[Aren't you forgetting something?|Villon gives wallet back]] [[You thief!|Villon gives wallet back]]

title: Villon gives wallet back
body:
"Me?"

"Oh you mean the wallet? I don't know how that got there."

 "Pardonne-moi mon ami!"


Villon gives back the wallet and runs away again.


Villon drops a paper of sheet music 


Pick up paper button 

Oracle: "Look at the back of the paper is addressed to the Carilloner"

<<if visited("Villon") is true>> [[ Go to the Carilloner|GotoCarilloner]] |]]

Villon's character sheet appears

Route to next location appears
